text:
Rezku | Senior Backend Programmer | Sacramento, CA | ONSITE | https://rezku.com

We're looking for a programmer to work on the backend for our restaurant point-of-sale. Play a pivotal role in shaping the software that restaurants across the nation depend on to operate their business.

You'll have a high degree of autonomy and agency, great benefits, 40 hour weeks (no late nights or working weekends), quiet workspace, and a weekly team happy hour.

Reach out to careers@rezku.com or see more details at https://www.indeed.com/job/backend-programmer-85c2a90e972f20...
